In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep17
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Humanity's Memory: China's World Heritage Ep48
programme.desc: Enjoy this showcase of cultural entertainment from across the Straits.

programme.title: Eye of the Rift Ep12
programme.desc: The program is based on precious animal videos shot by infrared cameras and remote cameras deployed in tens of thousands of protected areas in China.

programme.title: On the Way Ep136
programme.desc: a large-scale tourism programme that is designed to present rich tourism resources in China and around the world

programme.title: China Showbiz Ep33
programme.desc: The China Showbiz gathers together a wide range of wonderful TV artistic works and directs viewers into a fabulous world of arts through works appreciation and review.

programme.title: Encountering Civilizations Ep6
programme.desc: Encountering Civilizations is the first program with the theme of "Exchange and Mutual Learning between Chinese and Foreign Civilizations".

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep431
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Piggy's Counter-Attack (M) Ep6869
programme.desc: A rich father, who built his fortune from nothing, goes bankrupt overnight when his investments fail. His children are knocked out of heaven and have to launch a counterattack.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep1031
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep796797
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep653
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3356
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep29082909
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep903904
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1778
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1985
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Like That Also Can (M) Ep5
programme.desc:
We are " Jiangplay " challenge, we are " Jiangplay " experience, understanding life and fun! So, get out of your comfort zone, break through your echo chamber!
“Jiangplay” is an all new social media and reality show that our hosts experience, take on challenges by gathering trendie, old school, hippie and sub-cultures, creating unexpected fun and an all new impression on learning, giving you resonating inspiration and rush in each episode.

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man’s wife, mistress, love child and his grandma for a huge ransom. Little did they expect that the heartless tycoon has hired an assassin to take them out instead of paying the ransom.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: The pregnant queen of the monster realm flees a civil war and lands in human world, near Yung Ning Village. She seeks the help of a wimpy villager to become the surrogate father for her child, Wuba. From the time he was born, little Wuba embarks on a thrilling journey to escape from those who want to capture him at all costs.

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: An incompetent soccer goalkeeper for a minor league suddenly inherits thirty billion yuan in this mind-boggling comedy. In order to get the full amount, he must first spend one billion yuan on himself in a month without telling anyone about the task, and is also not allowed to own any assets at the end of it.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, “The Eagle Shooting Heroes” is loosely based on Louis Cha’s classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung’s action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Ru’s financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the client’s data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: In this movie directed by John Woo, lawyer Du goes on the run after he is framed for a murder. Veteran detective Yamura suspects the case to be more complicated than it seems, and while he understands Du better during the hunt, Yamura still doubts his innocence. Is the real killer lurking elsewhere? Is there a hidden conspiracy behind the murder?

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idol’s memory.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about ‘home and country’ is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the ‘fathers’ forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the ‘fighting’ spirit through generations.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong’s biggest stars

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a housewife living with her family. When a stranger uses her dark history to blackmail her, Mrs K is forced to face an old enemy to save her family.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: The Big Call
programme.desc: A young policeman goes undercover to try and capture a criminal group specializing in mobile fraud who has swindled hundreds of millions of yuan from business tycoons and ordinary people.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: The Golden Monk
programme.desc: A monk realizes he is the reincarnation of Golden Child who was cast down from heaven to experience life and death a hundred times, as he broke a sacred rule by falling in love with a fairy, Jade. While his memories are erased, Jade refuses to forget their love and accumulates goodwill over a hundred reincarnations to end Golden Child’s suffering.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by Jin Yong, havoc breaks out when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, training manual, treasure map & a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: Ode To Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung is the son of an entrepreneur of a big corporation. Lian Lian is the niece of a Kindergarten’s principal. Fate has brought them together as Da Yung loses his wallet by mistake when they first met. Further misunderstanding occurs when Da Yung tries to use Lian Lian as an excuse to drive the two women he does not love away.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the men’s help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: Pursuit Of A Killer
programme.desc: The charm of Pursuit Of A Killer lies in the long awaited reunion of Five Venoms duo, Lo Meng and Sun Chien; Lo Meng, who plays a Mainland Chinese criminal escapee to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop (Sun Chien) who helps him adjust to Hong Kong life while tracking down his mysterious killer at the same time.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Chik, one of the assassins of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to leave the clan when a kind family saved him. When pursued by the clan, a swordsman whose wife was killed by him saved his life. They decide to jointly take revenge on the clan.

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: It's a fact: the greatest martial arts movie character is Huang Fei-hung. But it's quite possible the second greatest character is "Beggar Su", one of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers, and a legendary Ching Dynasty figure. Little known director Liu Shih-yu decided to fill his telling of the character's life story with the best kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer. He reunited the stars of Liu Chia-liang's landmark Dirty Ho -- Gordon Liu Chia-hui, Wang Yu, and Wang Lung-wei--added such other greats as multi-award-winning Ku Feng and Pai Piao, then gave workhorse Lo Chiang his shot as choreographer. Together they made a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. Finally, after much death and destruction, Gordon Liu Chia-hui and Wang Lung-wei get a memorable rematch to follow their classic masterpieces in Dirty Ho and Martial Club. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liang's work, but essentially an homage to him as well!

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: With Hong Kong cinema's new wave, high flying, martial arts action of the 1980's, came a new wave of actors; teeny-bopper, canto-pop singer/stars with little or no martial arts background. However, when a film like LITTLE DRAGON MAIDEN intelligently mixes the old with the new, the results are pure golden magic. This costume-action, drama, love story features relative newcomer Leslie Cheung, who falls in love with the Dragon Maiden while learning the art of swordplay. The recipe is complete when veteran kung-fu stars Chen Kuan-tai and Lo Lieh add just enough weapon-wielding spice to make this film really cook. Cheung garnered international recognition in John Woo's A BETTER TOMORROW and Ronny Yu's THE BRIDE WITH WHITE HAIR.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon’s clutches.

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughter's lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: Journey Of The Doomed
programme.desc: Journey Of The Doomed stars Tung Wei as a knight that finds himself protecting the life of a beautiful young lady, the lost Emperor's daughter and stalked by a bunch of assassins headed by kung fu actress extraordinaire Hui Ying-Hung.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandma’s pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chief’s daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them…

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: In Swift Sword, popular director Ho Meng-hua exposes a whole cast of established talent to create a searing martial arts extravaganza that reeks of steel-slashing bewitchment worthy of any swordplay epic.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister’s wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Ambitious Prince Four (Liu Yung) attempts to kill the potential heir Prince Fourteen (Mok Siu-chung), but the latter is rescued by his aide Tseng Tsing (Hsu Shao-chiang). After an unsuccessful attempt to buy Tseng Tsing, Prince Four tries to murder him, but fails. He eventually hires Nien Keng-yao (Pai Piao), an outstanding martial artist, as his aide.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang’s fiancé and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him…

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind…

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: The Chinese Navy is attempting to defend its coastline from a Japanese attack, they send their commando unit led by Cui Hsia into the mainland to enlist help to thwart the Japanese before they attack. The commandos enlist the help of Song San and Shiao Liu to kill the Japanese officers led by Shan Mao and destroy their attacking ships.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: The venerated Sun Chung made many different kinds of films for Shaw Brothers, including popular and renowned satirical comedies, contemporary action dramas, and magnificent martial arts movies. This is one of his last of the latter for the studio, so he wanted to have fun... and let the audience share it. Toward that end he cast international favorite Alexander Fu Sheng as the title character who keeps testing the patience (and kung-fu skills) of his father, a small town bonesetter and herbal healer played by award-winning character actor Ku Feng. But when a local dignitary not only smuggles drugs but plans to give a Chinese treasure away to evil outsiders, the father and son unite to take on foreign fighters and even Japanese ninja in a non-stop display of comic action prowess.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu-lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun-yang.

programme.title: Kolamavu Kokila
programme.desc: Kokila, who has financial issues, gets involved in a drug racket to earn quick money. Eventually, her family also gets dragged in the internal drug war which, in turn, puts their lives at risk.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Sarkarin Elam
programme.desc: Zee Tamil Movie

programme.title: Desingu Raja
programme.desc: A love story with boy and girl from feuding villages.

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: The film was a box-office success and was dubbed in a couple of languages.The story revolves around Akhilan, an ex-RAW agent who is assigned the task to track down the culprit who is responsible for the attack on Indian Embassy in Malaysia.

programme.title: Kadaisi Nodigal (Forensic)
programme.desc: When a psychotic murderer sets out on a killing spree, a medico-legal advisor uses his forensic skills to unravel the truth behind the heinous deeds.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: A girl who has lost her parents is facing the issue of pursuing an independent life or raising her younger brother.

programme.title: Guna 369
programme.desc: The life of Guna, a happy-go-lucky man, turns upside down when he is falsely framed for a murder and imprisoned. After his release, he sets off to hunt the real culprits and expose their crimes.

programme.title: Sridevi Soda Centre
programme.desc: Suri Babu, a lightman, and Sridevi, a girl who runs a soda centre, decide to get married in spite of opposition from Sridevi's family owing to their different castes.

programme.title: Nagesh Thiraiarangam
programme.desc: Nagesh tries to make his ends meet by working as a real estate broker. He tries to sell his ancestral property for his sister's wedding but soon paranormal occurrences become a part of his life.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Bhaskar Oru Rascal
programme.desc: Bhaskar, a single parent, is labelled rascal because of his impolite behaviour. His son, Akash, decides to set him up with Anu, whose daughter is Akash's classmate.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends, with their new boss Gouravam, come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant. Their plans get messed up when Saravanan falls for Aishwarya, who is also pursued by a gangster.

programme.title: Dangal
programme.desc: After his failure at winning a gold medal for the country, Mahavir Phogat vows to realise his dreams by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite societal pressures.

programme.title: Kaadaan
programme.desc: The bond between humans and elephants with Bandevs story as he fights for the protection of his ele-friends.

programme.title: Anbudan Ungal Karthik
programme.desc: Zee Tamil Movie

programme.title: Idhu Kathirvelan Kadhal
programme.desc: Kathir, who hates marriage, is in Coimbatore to resolve a family dispute. There, he falls for Pavithra but his heart is broken when he discovers that she is in love with someone else.

programme.title: Mirchi Masala
programme.desc: A woman decides to fight against her powerful oppressor. When the guard of a chilli factory helps her, the women and the teacher of the village join them to openly defy the prevailing repression.

programme.title: Magalir Mattum
programme.desc: Prabhavati, an independent documentary filmmaker, with the help of her friends takes her mother-in-law, Gomatha, on a surprise trip to reunite her with her school friends.

programme.title: Priest
programme.desc: A priest and a police officer are trying to solve a set of mysterious suicides. As their investigation closes in, they discover another crime with even farther-reaching consequences.

programme.title: Podhuvaga En Manasu Thangam
programme.desc: A young man's dream to do good deeds for the upliftment of his village is interrupted by an influential man, who does not want anyone to grow above him.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Kaaviya Thalaivan
programme.desc: Two rival artists at Sivadas Swamigal's drama troupe compete in everything they do. While one of them goes on to become successful, the other fails in life.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep1
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep9
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep10
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep91
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep92
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep32
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep33
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep33
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior

programme.title: Aval

programme.title: Eli
programme.desc: Eli is a skilled trickster who manages to fool the police and escape from their clutches several times. Due to his abilities, a retired policeman seeks his help to solve a crime.

programme.title: Billu
programme.desc: The people in a village discover that Billu, a poor barber, is a childhood friend of the superstar Sahir Khan, who has arrived for a film shoot. They shower him with favours to introduce them to him.

programme.title: Department
programme.desc: Inspector Mahadev Bhosale recruits Shiv Narayan, a suspended brave police officer, to form a hit squad. Soon after Shiv joins the gangster-turned-minister Sarjerao Gaikwad, Mahadev and Shiv turn foes.

programme.title: Romeo. Akbar. Walter.
programme.desc: A bank cashier, Romeo, is recruited by India's intelligence agency for espionage in Pakistan. However, he finds himself in challenging situations when his cover gets blown.

programme.title: Beqabu
programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.

programme.title: Jab Pyaar Kisise Hota Hai
programme.desc: Sooraj Dhanrajgir, a playboy, falls in love with Komal, who rejects him because of his vices and gives him time to change. Things go awry when a little boy shows up claiming to be his son.

programme.title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
programme.desc: Anshul, Siddharth and Tarun each fall in love at the same time with different women. However, their relationships soon turn toxic and make them realise the dark side of love.

programme.title: English Babu Desi Mem
programme.desc: Vikram and Hari, twin brothers, are heirs to the Mayur group of industries. However, after Hari's death, Vikram must care for his orphaned nephew.

programme.title: English Babu Desi Mem
programme.desc: Vikram and Hari, twin brothers, are heirs to the Mayur group of industries. However, after Hari's death, Vikram must care for his orphaned nephew.

programme.title: Paheli
programme.desc: A ghost falls in love with a newly-wed woman. To be closer to her, he follows her and takes on the guise of her husband while the latter is away on business.

programme.title: Om Shanti Om
programme.desc: Om, a junior film artist, is smitten by Shantipriya, a renowned actress, but is killed while trying to save her from a fire accident. Thirty years later, he is reborn and sets out to avenge her death.

programme.title: Badrinath Ki Dulhania
programme.desc: Badri, a wealthy man's son, meets Vaidehi at a wedding and sparks fly between them. However, while he wants nothing more than to marry her, she yearns to pursue her dream of becoming an air hostess.

programme.title: Sangdil Sanam
programme.desc: Kishan and Sanam are engaged as children but are separated when his father is accused of a robbery. Later, a grown-up Kishan sets out to claim Sanam as his bride unaware that she is a changed person.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Dil Hai Tumhaara
programme.desc: Shalu, a feisty young girl, falls in love with her employer's son, Dev. However, she decides to sacrifice her love after learning that her own sister, Nimmi, is also in love with him.

programme.title: Soldier
programme.desc: After Major Vijay Malhotra's colleagues betray him, he is branded as a traitor and subsequently killed. But his son, Vicky, vows to take revenge on his father's murderers and prove his innocence.

programme.title: Lucknow Central
programme.desc: Kishen, an inmate in a Lucknow jail, yearns to be set free. When he learns that a few prisoners must form a band, he sees it as his ticket to freedom.

programme.title: Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela
programme.desc: Ram and Leela love each other but cannot stay together as their families, Rajadi and Sanera, have been at war with each other for the past 500 years. In the end, they both need to make a sacrifice.

programme.title: Heroes
programme.desc: Two students embark on a trip to film a documentary focussing on why one must not join the Indian Armed Forces. However, by the end of their project, their perspective goes through a paradigm shift.

programme.title: Hum Kisise Kum Nahin
programme.desc: Munna Bhai, a gangster, meets Komal and instantly falls in love with her. In a bid to marry her, he must fight with Komal's elder brother, Dr Rastogi, and her lover, Raja.

programme.title: Mary Kom
programme.desc: When Mary Kom encounters a renowned coach in a boxing gym, she shares her boxing aspirations with him and convinces him to teach her. Despite her father's disapproval, she follows her passion.

programme.title: Bajirao Mastani
programme.desc: The heroic Peshwa Bajirao, married to Kashibai, falls in love with Mastani, a warrior princess in distress. They struggle to make their love triumph amid opposition from his conservative family.

programme.title: One By Two
programme.desc: Amit struggles with a mundane life and a recent breakup, while Samara, an aspiring dancer, tries to win a reality show. After several accidental escapes, the strangers' paths finally cross.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Chaahat
programme.desc: When Roop comes to the city for his father's medical treatment, he falls for Pooja and proposes to her. However, when a spoilt Reshma falls for him, she turns crazy and tries to own him.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: A young Navy lawyer risks his career to uncover the truth during a military trial.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince Of Thieves
programme.desc: Kevin Costner is the legendary swashbuckling hero of England’s Sherwood Forest who defends the poor and battles Alan Rickman’s deliciously evil Sheriff of Nottingham.

programme.title: Romeo Must Die
programme.desc: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A mother and her daughter retreat to what they believe is a secure sanctuary during a brutal home invasion.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: In this wild action adventure, Axel Foley discovers that mobsters are using a theme park as a front for their money-counterfeiting operation, and defeats the evil scheme while turning the park upside down.

programme.desc: The adventures of a group of friends in the years after their graduation from Georgetown University.

Meanwhile, Aaron Echolls (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN) hires Keith to find out who's supplying pictures to the tabloids that humiliate his wife, Lynn (recurring guest star LISA RINNA). programme.title: Diplomat Talks Ep116
programme.desc: Diplomats residing in South Korea have prepared special stories to share and have extended their invitations to viewers around the world. Through in-depth conversations with ambassadors who are at the center of global discussions, viewers can learn about near, but far neighboring countries, as well as the rest of the multicultural nations co-existing on our planet. "Diplomat Talks" will be sharing stories from ambassadors, never been told before, with its viewers around the world.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep186
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Robson and Jim's Icelandic Fly Fishing Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Today they are looking to find, catch and release the wild Atlantic Salmon.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep1
programme.desc: On icebreaker ship Polarstern, the team battle cracking ice, hungry polar bears, violent storms and 24-hour darkness, as they struggle to establish their research base deep inside the Arctic Circle.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep7
programme.desc: In this episode, tortilla chips are produced by the thousand, bite-size coffee cakes are created, and vegan mint double chocolate cookies are made. Plus, a look at microwaveable popcorn.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep8
programme.desc: This episode looks at the production of Triple "C" cheesecake, animal crackers, crispy sweet potato fries, and the tofu that gets a gourmet overhaul.

programme.title: Wild Thailand S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Central Heartland - Life in Thailand is changing fast, resulting in people and animals having to find new ways to get along together.

programme.title: Robson and Jim's Icelandic Fly Fishing Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Today they are looking to find, catch and release the wild Atlantic Salmon.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep1
programme.desc: On icebreaker ship Polarstern, the team battle cracking ice, hungry polar bears, violent storms and 24-hour darkness, as they struggle to establish their research base deep inside the Arctic Circle.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep7

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep8
programme.desc: This episode looks at the production of Triple "C" cheesecake, animal crackers, crispy sweet potato fries, and the tofu that gets a gourmet overhaul.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Alexander visits the awesome Gyeonbokgung Palace, picks something up at the vast Yangnyeongsi herbal market, and even takes a look at the lucrative culture of fortune-telling, before taking lessons in drumming.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Golden Age - In Twin Dragon Alley, in the city of Kaifeng, locals tell Michael him the legend of the baby boys who became emperors. He looks at China's most famous work of art - the Kaifeng scroll.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep9
programme.desc: In this episode we get to peek at the production of Hershey's Kisses, a fusion of the French crepe and the Russian blini, the gummy candies that look just like rainforest frogs, and the extraction of Madagascan vanilla extract.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep10
programme.desc: This episode looks at the production of tutti-frutti candies, spinach potato latkes, gluten-free shirataki noodles, and how to make guilt-free crisps with pinto beans and vegetables.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Tibet - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: As the mid-autumn festival brings families together, and September turns into October, we find out how autumn rains make life difficult for engineers building a huge dam out of concrete.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The team endures through the extremes of Arctic winter close to the North Pole. Through the 24-hour darkness they work to revolutionise our ability to monitor sea ice using satellites, and they explore how the melting ice is releasing its own damaging greenhouse gases.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Philippines - Robson visits some of the 7000 islands of the Philippines, and although it is a paradise the local fish are powerful, aggressive and stubborn.

Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The team endures through the extremes of Arctic winter close to the North Pole. Through the 24-hour darkness they work to revolutionise our ability to monitor sea ice using satellites, and they explore how the melting ice is releasing its own damaging greenhouse gases.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: As the mid-autumn festival brings families together, and September turns into October, we find out how autumn rains make life difficult for engineers building a huge dam out of concrete.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep9
programme.desc: In this episode we get to peek at the production of Hershey's Kisses, a fusion of the French crepe and the Russian blini, the gummy candies that look just like rainforest frogs, and the extraction of Madagascan vanilla extract.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep10
programme.desc: This episode looks at the production of tutti-frutti candies, spinach potato latkes, gluten-free shirataki noodles, and how to make guilt-free crisps with pinto beans and vegetables.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Tibet - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The team endures through the extremes of Arctic winter close to the North Pole. Through the 24-hour darkness they work to revolutionise our ability to monitor sea ice using satellites, and they explore how the melting ice is releasing its own damaging greenhouse gases.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep11
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into the mega-industrial production lines of food factories. This episode looks at peanut buttercups and pasta sauce.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep12
programme.desc: In this episode we see how a leading chocolatier produces up to 500,000 bars daily. Plus, how cashews are used in the Indian treat known as kaju katli, and a peek at the production of pecan cookies.

programme.title: Snow Dogs: Into the Wild S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog. First, Gordon must train his dogs and earn their trust. Next they must learn to travel as a team.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Last Empire - China's last empire, the Qing, began in violence and war but Michael reveals how under the Qing, China doubled in size to include Xinjiang, Mongolia and Tibet.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Fiji, Pacific Ocean - Ben Fogle is reunited with seafarer Rick, who has moved on to pastures new since their original encounter. When Rick last appeared on the series, he was living off the coast of French Polynesia, but he has since made a fresh start on the Pacific island of Fiji.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Zimbabwe - The journey begins in southern Africa, where Robson seeks the legendary vundu catfish at Lake Kariba.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep13
programme.desc: See how the decadent flavour of ice cream is made with chocolate pudding and cookies. Plus, how champagne and strawberry lollipops are made, and how truffle pigs are filled with peanut butter.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Revealing the mouthwatering secrets behind tasty treats. This episode looks at how healthy muffins and red-hot candies are made.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Patterned Planet - From space, Earth's surface is covered in wonderful shapes. Wombats dig burrows across the Australian outback and elephants in in the Congo clear an opening in the forest.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Age of Revolution - Michael reveals how three cataclysmic revolutions between 1850 and 1950 shook China to the core. He ends his story with Mao's death and the boom time of the last thirty years.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep3
programme.desc: How can a glass dome be built big enough to house a mountain? What happens when a major railway station is completely taken apart and rebuilt - during the rush hour?

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Kenya - Robson heads to the east coast of Kenya, where the Indian Ocean offers some of the best game fishing in the world.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer

programme.desc: An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lanka’s kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle… and there’s a new dynasty in power. Monkeys.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - Return of the African Titans Ep1
programme.desc: There are eight North African white rhinos left in the world and only four are of breeding age. With the clock ticking on their species, an international mission has been working for several years to move the four to Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Defenders of the Reef Ep4

programme.desc: Journey to the wild Pacific coast on the western shore of Vancouver Island in British Columbia. From the peaks of mountain glaciers to the canopies of Canada’s only rainforest, nature and human spirit coexist in spectacular habitats.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 - Humpback Birth of a Giant Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the first months of a newborn humpback whale’s life in the waters off the Pacific Coast of Columbia. See how his mother nurtures him through sickness, supports his body, protects him under attack, and prepares him for an epic journey.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Christmas Island Ep3

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Strutter Sitting / Corny-O Chaos - The Strutter siblings hold a yard sale and babysit at the same time. Archibald races for a big prize: a lifetime supply of his favorite cereal.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much/Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit - When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever Ep11
programme.desc: Elder Skelter / A More Perfect Reunion - Audrey is in for more than she expected after taking over the Elder position. Dot’s preschool reunion, pushes her to look more accomplished than her old rival.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race—loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Strutter Sitting / Corny-O Chaos - The Strutter siblings hold a yard sale and babysit at the same time. Archibald races for a big prize: a lifetime supply of his favorite cereal.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep11
programme.desc: Angerdome / Tush Twins - Tip battles an alien as angry as she is at the Boov's Angerspringa festival./Sharzod and Lucy become besties and call themselves the “Tush Twins.”

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep11
programme.desc: My Fair Foosa - To bring peace to his kingdom, King Julien “civilizes” a Foosa.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep11
programme.desc: Hit Or Myth In Greece - When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep11
programme.desc: The Poppy Horror Picture Show / Dinkles Dinkles Little Star - After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Bug Zapper/The Helper - When Mr. Ladybug finds the new bug zapper the Humans installed to be irresistible, the Mighty Ones try creating distractions to keep him from zapping himself. / When Rabbit realizes Rocksy is great at "conflict management," he tricks her into helping him strongarm other yard denizens in order to get what he wants.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Smartysaurus'S Jet Pack - Smartysaurus is trying out her new jet pack, but she hasn't read the instructions before taking off and cannot control it properly. Noddy investigates to help her control it before things get too dangerous.

programme.desc: The Case Of The Topsy Turvy Trees - All is set for the Toy Green Picnic until Noddy finds some of the trees turned upside down! Was it the Ninjas climbing on them? Or the Pirates wanting an upside-down tree for Pirate Bay? Noddy launches an investigation to find out who's behind all this.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8
programme.desc: The Case Of The Golden Thing - The Knights have found a mysterious Golden Thing. But the Pirates insist it's their Golden Thing. Noddy tries to settle the argument by investigating: Who is the owner of the Golden Thing? He soon finds more and more Golden Things have been hidden all over Toyland.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep5
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Noisy Story - Topsy wants to tell her friends her favourite story but they interrupt her making lots of noise. Topsy is upset. Raa Raa realises what has happened and goes to make amends.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep6
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jingly Jangly Jungle Band - Raa Raa becomes the singer in Crockys Jingly Jangly Jungle Band but he gets so carried away with his singing that he forgets a promise.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep7
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Banana Balloons - Its Banana Day in the Jingly Jangly Jungle and Huffty gives everyone a banana balloon to play with but while Raa Raas friends are playing Banana Day games Raa Raa doesnt seem quite himself.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep8
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Crocky’S Lost Toy - When Raa Raa accidently loses Crockys favourite Toy hes determined to find it again and with a little help from his friends and by using his eyes and ears he does just that

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep5
programme.desc: Car Boot Sale - Big Chris has a clear out and takes all his old junk up to Farmer Green's car boot sale but misses the clutter in Rusty. How will he get everything back?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep6
programme.desc: Hot Stuff - Big Chris takes the cars to the beach to relax in the heat but he is so busy dealing with the cars he forgets to drink his water. But hang on, who else has drunk it…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep7
programme.desc: Law And Order - Mr Carburettor is fed up with the cars running amok on his track and summons Bill and Nick to restore order to the track. But might our overzealous policeman overstep the mark?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep8
programme.desc: Flash'S Tea Party - Flash invites everyone to a tea party, thinking they bring the food with them. Are there going to be a lot of hungry bunnies at Silver hatch?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep3
programme.desc: Bully For You / The Ra Animator - Bully For You When Casper decides he can't take any more of Thatch's nastiness, he forms a secret squad dedicated to putting an end to bullying. The Ra-minator Using the power of invisibility, Casper offers to help transform Ra from a sports zero to an athletic hero.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep4
programme.desc: Weekend At Bunny'S / Grimly Day - Weekend at Bunny's Alder and Dash sound the alarm after a terrifying creature threatens Scare School. Grimly Day It's Grimly Day?the grimmest day of the year!

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep12
programme.desc: The Next Big Sting - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders rescue a wounded Speed Stinger and take it back to Dragon's Edge, unaware of the dangers that follow.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep12
programme.desc: Goblin - Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo – but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep12
programme.desc: Diapers Are The New Black - King Julien discovers diapers and brings style to his lemur subjects, igniting a fashion war.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep12
programme.desc: Ottos - When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Olivia Ep23
programme.desc: Olivia Acts Out - It's time for the annual school play, but Olivia's stuck playing the part of “Cow #2,” while Francine lands the starring role. It's up to Olivia to make the most of her small part: with a little help from Julian, she choreographs a climactic mooove for herself and has the crowd on their feet.

programme.title: Olivia Ep24
programme.desc: Olivia And The School Concert - The theme of this year's school concert is “Fantastic Fruits and Vibrant Vegetables,” and Olivia couldn't be more thrilled. But poor Julian can't bear the thought of singing his celery song in front of an audience. With a little imagination and some quick thinking, Olivia helps him overcome his stage fright.

programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Hooting Huffty - Hufftys not feeling well so his friends try to cheer him up with games but his loud elephant sneezes keep interrupting. Thats until Raa Raa thinks up a way to make his sneezes part of the fun

programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jungle Lookout - Raa Raa and his friends have fun searching the Jingly Jangly Jungle for Hufftys whooshy whooshers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Sage and Ginger's Baby Book - Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Paddington Joins A Band - The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Ice Cream Monster Machine - Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot something important - the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach Gasquatch's house in time!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep508
programme.desc: The Gold Medal Games - It's time for the Gold Medal Games, and Blaze is ready to compete! But when Crusher cheats and sends his rival flying far away, Blaze has to speed back to Axle City to beat the buzzer and win that medal!

programme.desc: Chickcharney Island/The Lost Girl in a Canoe - With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum. // The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep161

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Grandparent Trap / Miss Step - Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparent's marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.desc: Slink or Swim / The Big Chill - When Bobby finds out Carl can't swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.desc: Stunt City / Of Dads and Dudes - The stunt team sees the daily action around the city and realize they need to up their game with Billy and Maddy's help. // Chief Wheeler's uptight father comes to the city with plans to invest in the big stunt show Wheeler loves.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Inside Russell / The Stinkhole Chronicles - Parker must save Angus from rapidly aging inside Russell's belly. // Parker and Lily go on a quest through Old Stinkhole to rescue Angus.

programme.desc: Of Mice and Munks - The Chipettes fall in love with a cute little mouse that's doomed to be fed to a snake as part of a science class.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Simon Saves the World - Simon's new invention threatens to destroy the world, creating a time loop and changing gravity inside the house.
