programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep111
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants vs. The Big One - SpongeBob and his friends are swept away by a giant wave and find themselves stranded on a remote tropical island. To get back to Bikini Bottom, they need to learn how to surf from enigmatic surf guru, Jack Kahuna Lagun.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Traditions - Robby backs out of Alex's traditional Wakwak hunt, so Alex shares his family history with Bumblebee, while Twitch, eager to gain her own traditions, encounters "Dad2" - Wheeljack.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Big Freeze - Nate and Team Awesome face Jefferson in the annual 'Big Freeze' snow sculpture competition. Nate has his sights set on victory, but when a personal vendetta gets in the way, glory and a grand prize for P.S. 38 are on the line.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Kings of the Con - Eager to be named Kings of the Con at the Ace Savvy convention, Lincoln and Clyde convince the sisters to go with them as the Full Deck. // But the girls get more attention, leading the boys to do whatever it takes to gain focus.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Sister Act / House Flip - To get out of doing things they don't like, Lana and Lola secretly switch places and pretend to be the other. // After causing Flip to get hurt, the kids sneak him into the attic to care for him without Mom and Dad knowing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep163
programme.desc: Mermaidman Begins / Plankton's Good Eye - Mermaidman and Barnacleboy let SpongeBob and Patrick in on their secret, heroic origins! // Using SpongeBob's DNA, Plantkon grows himself a second eye...and becomes nice!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep122
programme.desc: Chum Bucket Supreme / Single Cell Anniversary - Plankton hires Patrick to create advertising slogans for the Chum Bucket. // SpongeBob helps Plankton find the perfect anniversary gift for Karen.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep101
programme.desc: First Delivery / Chore or Less - While delivering a letter to a house that never gets mail, the gang goes through warfare to get to its front door. // In an attempt to be more like Angus, Parker does the chores and realizes that they're actually boring.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Tenta-Flakes / Boss Level - Best and Bester go on a mission to find out what gives their favourite cereal "Tenta-Flakes" such a purply taste. // Bester's outlandish ideas to make mini golf fun for the customers nearly lead to disaster, but Best saves the day.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Mexican Makeover / Uptown Funk - Adelaide and Carl have an adventure on Mr. Chang's route, but can they work together to save the day? // When Mama Lupe comes to visit, Abuela tries to get her family at the top of their cultural game.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Bo Bo Business / Blunder Party - Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day! // After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Cursed! - Celebrity psychic Ernesto Estrella deems Great Lakes City to be bad luck and Abuela believes him!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Darker Parker / Lady of the Tree - Parker makes snowcones for everybody in town and learns that saying 'no' isn't always a bad thing. // Parker and Angus make a delivery to a spooky old woman in the Middlemost Forest... who might be a witch!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Sleepover / The 'B' Word - Parker has a sleepover for the first time and enlists Angus's help to make it as fun as possible. // Parker and Angus go the distance to try and give Russell a bath before her stench becomes destructive.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep234
programme.desc: Patnocchio / ChefBob - Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty. // When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep235
programme.desc: Plankton Paranoia / Library Cards - Plankton hasn't tried to steal the secret formula in a while...and that's making Mr. Krabs nervous! // When Patrick discovers the pineapple's library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Call the Cops! / Surf N' Turf - Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Break Up - When two Croc Bandits have a spat, it's up to Po and Mr. Ping to set things right.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Kung Shoes - In an attempt to get out of training, Po buys some enchanted shoes that will heighten his kung fu abilities. Unfortunately for Po, the magical shoes are evil and will soon put him and all those around him in great danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Avatar and The Firelord - Aang and Zuko are taken on parallel adventures that give them insight into their forefathers' pasts - but how does the tale of Roku and Sozin matter to them now?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep230
programme.desc: Pet's Peeved - The Vesuvius Twins bring Skipper and Julien to their home and force them to fight one another.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Skorca! / Tagged - On watch-duty, Private sees a terrifying Skorka: a sky orca whale. No one believes it exists, so Private sets out to battle the Sorka on his own. // When the penguins are interrupted mid-operation by a nosey scientist, they leave the zoo in danger.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep116
programme.desc: What Goes Around / Mask of the Raccoon - A little girl loses her doll at the zoo, and Rico gives up his own doll to replace it. Private assures Rico that his good deed will come back to him. // When a raccoon shows up and starts stealing from the zoo animals, the penguins jump into action.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Insane in the Crane Game / Buhdeuce Goes Berserks - SwaySway and Buhdeuce become obsessed with winning a toy out of the new crane game that's been installed at Pumpers. // When Buhdeuce gets a bad haircut, he goes berserks, and now SwaySway has to calm his buddy down before he gets busted by Rambamboo

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Parents Just Don't Understand - Evan is forced to return to his parents' house to secure Trolls Passage on the group's journey, but it won't be easy since he already burned that bridge.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Dorg and the Pony Prance / Dorg and the Normhole - When Dorg and his sister go head-to-head a contest and a spell goes awry, he must choose - win a trophy or save his sister. // RD acts as the town mascot in exchange for the legendary Mall Pass, which grants VIP treatment at every store in the mall!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Bumblebee Magnetic Karaoke Hippo / Time Out - Felicity helps a mashup creature to realize his true potential. // To avoid a visit to Dr. Lotzashots, Felicity borrows Father Time's watch.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Laked Nake / Doom Baby - The dudes' decision to babysit Richard Dickson might cost Craig his life. // A good day at the lake goes bad when Sanjay loses his bathing suit.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Sour Power / Birthday Shmirthday: A Cleo Badette Documentary - When Ollie becomes obsessed with a sour candy challenge, he convinces monster Jeffrey to eat the candy for him. // Told in documentary style, Cleo films Ollie's preparations for Bernie's surprise birthday party.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Trading Day / The Hard Sell - In a moment of weakness, Fanboy agrees to trade Chum Chum for one of Yo's awesome toys. // Oz's mom insists he sell one of his beloved collectibles by day's end, or she will get rid of them all and turn his store into a yogurt shop.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Monkey Business / Diary of a Mad Cat - When Birdbrain attempts to kidnap the latest boy band sensation, the Hunky Monkeys, it’s up to the gang at TUFF to save them. // In attempt to learn more about Kitty, Dudley accidentally sends her diary out in a mass email to everyone in Petropolis.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep521
programme.desc: A Perfect Date - The Winx and Specialists plan a proper, face to face date for Tecna and Timmy. Mishaps ensue, ultimately bringing them closer. Tecna cuts the date short in order to help the Winx keep the Pillar of Balance safe from Tritannus.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep522
programme.desc: Listen to Your Heart - The Sovereign Council must agree on how to protect the Magic Dimension. King Cryon of Zenith plans to look out only for his planet using an army of robot droids. When the droids fail, its up to the Winx to save the day.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Purple Jacket / Pizza Pit - An evil tech club lures Donnie with the promise of a gorgeous purple jacket. // It's Pizza Week, the greatest week of the year, but the Turtles' favorite pizza joints keep getting taken out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep8
programme.desc: Sandy's Rocket / Squeaky Boots - Sandy has taken on the enviable mission of taking a rocket ship into outer space. // Mr. Krabs surreptitiously gives SpongeBob a pair of squeaky boots in lieu of pay.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Dr. Zap vs Electroboy - Theodore is hit by lightning and believes he's like his comic book hero, until he's told he's actually a villain.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Mega Bounce Battle - The boys disobey Dave's orders to not play a dangerous game then have to hide their injuries when they get hurt.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Gossip Guy - The school newspaper has a sudden increase in sales when a gossip column appears poking fun at other students.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep120

programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Trevor and wife Jeanette are looking to build a very special home close to nature in which Trevor can move about easily in his wheelchair.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep11
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, to tell you what's happening and why it matters. Presented by Miriam Corowa.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep11
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, with reporters on the ground to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep11
programme.desc: When you need to know what's happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you the day's events from reporters across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories. Presented by Kamin Gock.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep11
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Kamin Gock.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia's premier daily current affairs show is back in 2023, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Presented by Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep11
programme.desc: More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. With a network of reporters we uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Kamin Gock.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep26
programme.desc: When Citipointe Christian College issued an enrolment contract asking parents to agree homosexuality was a sin, the protests of students sparked a firestorm around the rights of religious schools to practise their beliefs.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep11
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest news and the best coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Plus breaking news and live reports.

programme.title: Language and Me
programme.desc: A look at the role language plays for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people, highlighting the work done by language custodians to preserve this important aspect of our cultural and social lives. Hosted by Jack Evans.

programme.title: The World Ep11
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep25
programme.desc: The mighty rhino is making a comeback. In Zimbabwe it was poached to near extinction in the 2000s. We visit a wildlife sanctuary, with an elite anti-poaching squad, to see how the animal is being brought back from the brink.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep11
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you complete coverage of today's news from reporters on the ground to explain what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Tyne Logan.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia's premier daily current affairs show is back in 2023, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Presented by Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep11
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Tyne Logan.
